name: Metal Gauntlets
description:
Metal Gauntlets is a solo project created for the Dream Arcade Archive Game Jam.

You control a robot fighting through waves of giant insects to achieve a high score.

This game supports up to 3 local players: 1 keyboard / mouse and 2 controllers. Connecting a controller will cause additional player panels to display on the screen. To start the game, press ENTER for keyboard / mouse or START for controller. If a player dies, press ENTER or START to respawn. If all players die, the game resets to the very beginning. Player scores reset on death. Try to beat your high score!

Keyboard / Mouse

  Movement: [W, A, S, D]
  Aim: Mouse cursor
  Fire: Right / Left click
  Dash: [Space]

Controller
  Movement: Left stick
  Aim: Right stick
  Fire: Left / Right trigger
  Dash: Xbox A / Nintendo B / Playstation X button
